attributes.action: Not ignore the will of the people (i.e. the road pricing petition), and offer a referendum on all petition's!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony, seeing as you have completely ignored the 'road pricing' petition, where the Country made thier feelings patently clear.....could you make a vow to not ignore the will of the people and offer referendum's for the more sensible petition's on this site? I believe you are flying in the face of public opinion on the 'road pricing' petition and this is just a massive publicity stunt which has gone off in your face! Obviously, with just a couple of months left in office, you may have to pass this onto Gordon?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
